message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I'm thinking of selling it to you for $150.
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can work out a better deal. How about $100 for the product?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $135.
I understand your position, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my initial offer. How about $120 for the product?
